The Nifty futures on the Singapore Exchange, an early indicator of the Nifty performance in India, declined 0.2 percent to 8.754.Here are the stocks to watch out for in today’s session:






HDFC: Completes 3rd issue of Rupee Denominated Bonds worth Rs 1,000 crore to overseas investorsWipro: Announces partnership with Silicon Valley based Vectra Networks.

*Partnership to provide automated threat management solutions for detection of cyber attacks





HDFC has raised a total of Rs 4,500 crore so far by issuing masala bonds to overseas investors https://t.co/1b58XRPlzK— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) September 13, 2016






Manappuram Finance: Company allotted NCDs worth Rs 200 crore to ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund via private placement.NHPC/BHEL:  NHPC signs contract with BHEL for renovation of 180 MW Baira Siul plant. *NHPC awards contract to BHEL at total value of Rs 132.74 crore.Reliance Capital: Board approves the plan to list Reliance Home Finance Limited.*49 percent stake in Reliance Home Finance to be allotted to shareholders of Reliance Capital free of cost.Reliance Infrastructure: Company has not received any show cause notice from DRI and the company imports  0.4 percent of the total coal imports of the country.Reliance Power: Company has not received any show cause notice from DRI and the company imports 0.6 percent of the total coal imports of the country.Mahindra CIE: Acquires 100% equity in Bengaluru based Bill Forge for Rs 1331 crore.*Bill Forge is a precision forging firm with 6 manufacturing facilities in India.Mahindra CIE: To raise Rs 700 crore via public issue or QIP.*To issue 3.2 crore shares to certain shareholders on preferential basis at Rs 200/share.





Mahindra CIE to buy Bengaluru’s Bill Forge for Rs 1,331.2 crore https://t.co/Hr2vKg4ZFA pic.twitter.com/7g56mLcUNU— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) September 13, 2016






Gammon India: Company’s wholly owned subsidiary Gammon Holdings (Mauritius) Limited acquires 35 percent stake in Sofinter Group, Italy from BT Global Investors Limited for $32 million.*Post this acquisition it will hold 67.5 percent in Sofinter Group.Motherson Sumi:  Board approves issue and allotment of 17.7 lakh shares of FV 1 to Sumitomo Wiring at Rs 317 per share.Vedanta: Shareholders approve merger with Cairn India.Allahabad Bank: CARE assigns AA rating to bank’s Basel III compliant Tier 2 bonds aggregating to Rs 1000 crore.V-Mart Retail: Opens 2 new stores in Odisha.*Company now has 131 stores in 113 cities.IL&FS Transportation Networks: Board of Directors approve fund raising of up to Rs 5,000 crore through issue of NCDs.Fiem Industries: To raise Rs 120 crore via QIP at a Floor price of Rs 1054.70 per share.Setco Automotive: Bags order from Ashok Leyland to supply 380 dia coil spring clutch assy.Avanti Feeds: CARE upgrades working capital limit ratings.MBL Infra: Passes resolution to increase borrowing limit to Rs 3000 crore.Empee Distilleries: To consider allotment of 100 rated Redeemable NCDs of Rs 10 lakh each on September 16.Rollatainers: Stock to be split into two on September 23.Sicagen: To acquire 100% equity in Bengaluru based Danish Steel for an undisclosed amount.
title: Stocks To Watch: Coal India, Tata Steel, Reliance Comm, Mahindra CIE And More
